Class OfficerApplicationView

java.lang.Object
view.ApplicantProjectView
view.OfficerApplicationView
public class OfficerApplicationView extends ApplicantProjectView
View class for HDB Officer application interactions. This class extends ApplicantProjectView with officer-specific messages.
